resources.string: 1. All users accept responsibility for damage to equipment, property, and/or injury to personnel in and around DZ.
1. All users accept responsibility for damage to equipment, property, and/or injury to personnel in and around HLZ.
a. Horizontal margin of error +/-__dzMarginOfError__ meters, Vertical margin of error 1.5 X horizontal error.
b. MAGVAR __dzMagneticVar__ changing __dzMagChange__ per year derived from WMM 2015 as of __dzMagDerivedDate__.
4. Surveyor Observed Obstacles/Hazards on and within 1,000 meters of the DZ Boundary (All distances from DZ Centerpoint unless otherwise specified)
User is responsible for confirming ALL obstacle/hazard locations prior to conducting airdrop operations:
a. SOF Review Reported Obstacles/Hazards (including Rapidly Rising / High Terrain) within 5 NM Radius of the DZ Centerpoint:
a. DZ meets JPADS criteria for __dzDayNight__ operations Approved ADE is required prior to operations.
b. RPIs can be used. __dzCoordElevation__ will be passed for ADE approval prior to use.
5. Surveyor Observed Obstacles/Hazards on and within 1,000 meters of the HLZ Boundary (All distances from HLZ Centerpoint unless otherwise specified)
User is responsible fror confirming ALL obstacle/hazard locations prior to conducting airdrop operations:
a. SOF Review Reported Obstacles/Hazards (including Rapidly Rising / High Terrain) within 5 NM Radius of the HLZ Centerpoint:
All users accept responsibility for damage to equipment, property, and/or injury to personnel.
Nose Wheel will be placed at or near the following coordinates:
Largest tanker aircraft certified: __farpLargestTanker__ IAW T.O 00-25-172 Additional smaller aircraft: __farpAdditionalSmaller__
Rotary: __farpRotary__ Fixed Wing Size: __farpFixedWingSize__ aircraft certified IAW T.O. 00-25-172 which meet dimensional and egress criteria

a. Rwy __lzRunwayDirection__ Controlling Obstacle: ____ __lzControllingObstacle__ ____ Distance from obstacle to end of Clear Zone ____ __lzControllingObstacleDistance__ / __lzControllingObstacleHeight__ above runway __lzRunwayGSR__ GSR.

b. Rwy __lzInverseRunwayDirection__ Controlling Obstacle: ____ __lzInverseControllingObstacle__ ____ Distance from obstacle to end of Clear Zone ____ __lzInverseControllingObstacleDistance__ / __lzInverseControllingObstacleHeight__ above runway __lzInverseRunwayGSR__ GSR.

4. Surveyor Observed Obstacles/Hazards on and around the LZ (All distances from LZ Centerpoint unless otherwise specified) \nUser and LZSO are responsible for identifying/ confirming ALL obstacles/hazards prior to conducting operations:
5. Surveyor Observed Obstacles/Hazards on and within 1,000 meters of the LZ Boundary (All distances from LZ Centerpoint unless otherwise specified)

a. LZ surface extremely flat transverse left half runway), drainage criteria less than prescribed by aircraft criteria. Precipitation may result in standing/pooling water on surface. Check Runway Condition Rating (RCR)/Runway Surface Condition (RSC) and Runway Friction Factor (RFF)
8. Runway DCP Data processed with PCASE 2.09 / __lzRunwayDCPReadings__ readings taken to a depth of __lzRunwayDCPDepth__ inches.

a. Surface: __lzRunwaySurfaceBaseReadings__ CBR __lzRunwaySurfaceCBRReadings__ / Subbase __lzRunwaySubbaseReadings__ CBR __lzRunwaySubbaseCBRReadings__ / Subgrade __lzRunwaySubgradeReadings__ CBR __lzRunwaySubgradeCBRReadings__

c. __$vnl__C-17 @ 486,000 lbs = __lzRunwayC17Passes__ Passes /__$vnl__ C-130 @ 175,000 lbs = __lzRunwayC130Passes__ Passes /__$vnl__ C-130J @ 175,000 lbs = __lzRunwayC130JPasses__ Passes /__$vnl__ C-130J-30 @ 175,000 lbs = __lzRunwayC130J30Passes__ Passes /__$vnl__ C-146A @ 31,000 lbs = __lzRunwayC146APasses__ Passes /__$vnl__ PC-12 or C-145A @ 15,000 lbs = __lzRunwayC145APasses__ Passes"
9. Taxiway DCP Data processed with PCASE 2.09 /__$vnl__ __lzTaxiwayDCPReadings__ readings taken to a depth of __lzTaxiwayDCPDepth__ inches.

c.__$vnl__ C-17 @ 486,000 lbs = __lzTaxiwayC17Passes__ Passes /__$vnl__ C-130 @ 175,000 lbs = __lzTaxiwayC130Passes__ Passes /__$vnl__ C-130J @ 175,000 lbs = __lzTaxiwayC130JPasses__ Passes /__$vnl__ C-130J-30 @ 175,000 lbs = __lzTaxiwayC130J30Passes__ Passes /__$vnl__ C-146A @ 31,000 lbs = __lzTaxiwayC146APasses__ Passes /__$vnl__ PC-12 or C-145A @ 15,000 lbs = __lzTaxiwayC145APasses__ Passes"
10. Apron DCP Data processed with PCASE 2.09 / __lzApronDCPReadings__ DCP readings taken to a depth of __lzApronDCPDepth__ inches.

a. Surface: __lzApronSurfaceBaseReadings__ CBR __lzApronSurfaceCBRReadings__ /__$vnl__ Subbase __lzApronSubbaseReadings__ CBR __lzApronSubbaseCBRReadings__ /__$vnl__ Subgrade __lzApronSubgradeReadings__ CBR __lzApronSubgradeCBRReadings__

c.__$vnl__ C-17 @ 486,000 lbs = __lzApronC17Passes__ Passes /__$vnl__ C-130 @ 175,000 lbs = __lzApronC130Passes__ Passes /__$vnl__ C-130J @ 175,000 lbs = __lzApronC130JPasses__ Passes /__$vnl__ C-130J-30 @ 175,000 lbs = __lzApronC130J30Passes__ Passes /__$vnl__ C-146A @ 31,000 lbs = __lzApronC146APasses__ Passes /__$vnl__ PC-12 or C-145A @ 15,000 lbs = __lzApronC145APasses__ Passes"

string-array.name: hlzstmt
string-array.item: CAUTION: BROWN OUT CONDITIONS MAY EXIST!
